message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but that price is a little high for me. Could you do $10,500?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $10,500 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I understand, Alice.  $11,000 is still a bit more than I was hoping to spend. Would you consider $10,750?
